info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:18AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Whiteside, southwestern Carroll and northwestern Bureau Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 517 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garden Plain, or near Morrison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Rock Falls, Morrison, Fulton, Prophetstown, Garden Plain, Tampico, Lyndon, Coleta, Deer Grove, Emerson, Union Grove, Ustick, Fenton, Round Grove, Portland Corners, Penrose, Malvern, Como and White Pigeon. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 18 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Illinois.
